alert.note: Alert for Wilkes; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:24PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wilkes and Yadkin Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 624 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Swancreek, or near Ronda, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yadkinville... Jonesville... Boonville... Ronda... Windy Gap... Nebo... and Buck Shoals. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for north central and northwestern North Carolina...and southwestern Virginia.
